l2_idioms.idiom: The apple doesn't fall far from the tree

l1_vocab.meaning: 利润丰厚的 / 赚钱的

l1_idioms.meaning: 白手起家 / 从头开始

l2_idioms.idiom: When in Rome, do as the Romans do

l1_idioms.usage: I worked hard to climb the career ladder from intern to manager.
Being a pilot has always been my dream job.
It is difficult to make a living as an artist.

l2_idioms.usage: In many families, both parents work to bring home the bacon.
He quit because he felt stuck in a dead-end job.
To solve this economic crisis, we must think outside the box.

l1_idioms.usage: The sequel was a huge let-down compared to the first movie.
The media hyped up the film, but it was actually boring.
Watching that movie was a complete waste of time.

l2_vocab.meaning: 自动化 (used in context of CGI)

l2_idioms.usage: The new Marvel movie is a guaranteed box office hit.
The film features a star-studded cast of famous actors.

l2_idioms.idiom: On the edge of one's seat
l2_idioms.usage: The thriller kept the audience on the edge of their seats.
l2_idioms.meaning: 由于紧张兴奋而坐立不安

l1_idioms.usage: We should all do our bit to recycle plastic.
He talks about saving energy, but he doesn't practice what he preaches.
As a nature lover, she spends every weekend hiking.

l2_idioms.usage: One person recycling is just a drop in the ocean, but it helps.
Plastic pollution is just the tip of the iceberg of environmental issues.
The storm wreaked havoc on the coastal ecosystem.

l1_idioms.usage: I found a beautiful park that was off the beaten track.
I go to the forest to enjoy some peace and quiet.
Camping is a great way to get away from it all.

l2_vocab.meaning: 有治疗作用的 / 治愈的

l2_idioms.usage: Living in a concrete jungle can be stressful without green spaces.
This new park design is a breath of fresh air for the city.
l2_idioms.meaning: 令人耳目一新的人或事

l2_idioms.usage: Many city dwellers want to get back to nature on weekends.

l1_vocab.meaning: 用户友好的 / 易用的

l1_idioms.usage: My little brother is constantly glued to the screen.
With this app, all the information is at your fingertips.
I often lose track of time when playing games.

l2_idioms.usage: Technology is a double-edged sword; it connects and distracts us.
Social media often causes information overload.
She is a social butterfly online but shy in real life.

l1_idioms.usage: We are both unemployed, so we are in the same boat.
Don't take his criticism to heart; he was just tired.
My grandfather gave me a word of wisdom about patience.

l2_idioms.usage: You can't sit on the fence forever; you must make a decision.
Asking him for advice is like the blind leading the blind.
l2_idioms.meaning: 问道于盲 (外行指导外行)

l2_idioms.usage: He didn't study and learned the hard way when he failed.

l1_idioms.usage: The child thinks outside the box when painting.
She is truly in her element when drawing.
l1_idioms.meaning: 如鱼得水 (在自己擅长的领域)

l1_idioms.usage: He has a hidden talent for sculpture.

l2_idioms.idiom: Beauty is in the eye of the beholder
l2_idioms.usage: Modern art proves that beauty is in the eye of the beholder.
l2_idioms.meaning: 情人眼里出西施 (审美因人而异)

l2_idioms.usage: Despite his fame, the artist is very down to earth.
The report paints a bleak picture of the funding crisis.

l1_vocab.meaning: 破旧的 / 年久失修的

l1_idioms.usage: The Eiffel Tower is a famous landmark.
This ancient castle has stood the test of time.
The view from the skyscraper took my breath away.

l2_idioms.usage: Skyscrapers turn the city into a concrete jungle.
Everyone deserves a roof over their head.
Architecture can build bridges between cultures.

l1_idioms.idiom: Cost an arm and a leg

l2_idioms.meaning: 一线希望 / 坏事中的好事

l2_idioms.idiom: At the click of a button

l2_idioms.meaning: 适应新环境 / 站稳脚跟

l2_idioms.meaning: 花费太高 / 倾家荡产

l1_idioms.idiom: Judge a book by its cover

l2_idioms.idiom: Wear one's heart on one's sleeve
A friend in need is a friend indeed

l1_idioms.meaning: 不拘束 / 像在自己家一样

l2_idioms.idiom: One man's trash is another man's treasure

l1_idioms.meaning: 含着金汤匙出生 (context of luck vs talent)
小儿科 / 极容易的事
掌上明珠 / 最得意的珍宝
蒙在鼓里 / 在黑暗中

l2_idioms.meaning: 没坏就别修 (多一事不如少一事)

l1_idioms.meaning: 三个臭皮匠顶个诸葛亮

l1_idioms.meaning: 超越期望 / 尽心尽力

l1_idioms.meaning: 吐露心声 / 一吐为快
